name: Parallel GLUT
short_description: Parallel GLUT is a parallel implementation of the OpenGL utility toolkit (GLUT) library. It adds a minimal set of constraints and extensions to the GLUT API, allowing the usage of multiple GPU's for multiple display devices and/or increased performance.
